OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Donors complete questionnaire demographic , maternal history , gestational history , delivery . Cord blood unit ( CBU ) collect utero transported Stem Cell Processing Laboratory evaluate CBU volume cell count ( i.e. , total nucleate cell yield ) cryopreserved .
